title: HOUR 1 - Tom Brady, NBA playoffs, NFL
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Tom Brady, NBA playoffs, NFL
description:
Joy Taylor in for Colin

 

Tom Brady will be the lead analyst for Fox Sports when he retires

Thoughts on the NBA playoff games last night

Is it a good idea for the NFL to have another team in Dallas?


Guest: Ric Bucher

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
